creator: jfreidling@bigfoot.de
text:
At the page:
http://jakarta.apache.org/ant/manual/dirtasks.html

In the section "Examples":

<copy todir="${dist}">
  <fileset dir="${src}"/>
                      ^^^
    <include name="**/images/*"/>
    <exclude name="**/*.gif"/>
  </fileset>
</copy>

The "/" in the second line of the example is too much.
